name: Warcore Symphony
description: You play as a Tank that is a part of the Warcore Initiative where you must destroy all enemy tanks within the areas. You move forwards with the W key and backwards with the S key. A and D will turn your tank for better mobility. To fire your canon, use the left click on the mouse. If you lose all your health and die, press the E key at any time to reset the game. Good luck and happy hunting! Hoorah!!!
